statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_level >= 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE price <= 50.00 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_level, price FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT item_name, stock_level, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE stock_level >= 5 AND price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(stock_level) AS total_stock FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE price < 10
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = 1
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 20.00
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_items INNER JOIN stock_levels ON inventory_items.item_id = stock_levels.item_id
SELECT item_name, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM inventory_items INNER JOIN stock_levels ON inventory_items.item_id = stock_levels.item_id GROUP BY item_name
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM inventory JOIN transactions ON inventory.id = transactions.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sold > 100;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE total_amount > 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, total_amount, customer_name FROM orders JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM digital_goods;
SELECT name, price FROM digital_goods WHERE category = 'Software';
SELECT digital_goods_id, name, price FROM digital_goods ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, digital_goods_id, purchase_date, total_price FROM purchase_history WHERE total_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM digital_goods WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, category, price FROM digital_goods WHERE category='Software'
SELECT name, quantity, last_checked FROM inventory_management WHERE location='Main Warehouse' ORDER BY last_checked ASC

SELECT digital_goods.name, purchase_date, total_price FROM purchase_history INNER JOIN digital_goods ON purchase_history.digital_goods_id = digital_goods.digital_goods_id WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT digital_goods.name, quantity, last_updated FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale'
SELECT id, username FROM users
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' OR supplier_name LIKE 'B%'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' OR transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin'
